DataElement.preferredName: Minimal Residual Disease Prior Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Assessment Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A textual description of the minimal residual disease status prior to the hematopoietic cell transplantation.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Minimal Residual Disease Prior Hematopoietic Cell Transplantation Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Remainder of a tumor or a neoplasm/cancer after primary, potentially curative therapy._Earlier in time or order._A therapeutic procedure that involves the transplantation of hematopoietic stem cells, either with the patient as their own donor or from a donor to a patient. This can be used for treatment of malignant and non-malignant diseases._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: remainder of a tumor or a neoplasm/cancer after primary, potentially curative therapy.

Concepts.definition: Evidence for remaining tumor following primary treatment that is only apparent using highly sensitive techniques.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:A therapeutic procedure that involves the transplantation of hematopoietic stem cells, either with the patient as their own donor or from a donor to a patient. This can be used for treatment of malignant and non-malignant diseases.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: A therapeutic procedure that involves the transplantation of hematopoietic stem cells, either with the patient as their own donor or from a donor to a patient. This can be used for treatment of malignant and non-malignant diseases.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: remainder of a tumor or a neoplasm/cancer after primary, potentially curative therapy._A condition or state at a particular time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Negative Finding of Minimal Residual Disease

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Negative Finding of Minimal Residual Disease
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A finding of normality following an examination or investigation looking for the presence of a microorganism, disease, or condition.: remainder of a tumor or a neoplasm/cancer after primary, potentially curative therapy.

Concepts.definition: A finding of normality following an examination or investigation looking for the presence of a microorganism, disease, or condition.
Evidence for remaining tumor following primary treatment that is only apparent using highly sensitive techniques.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Positive Finding of Minimal Residual Disease

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Positive Finding of Minimal Residual Disease
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.: remainder of a tumor or a neoplasm/cancer after primary, potentially curative therapy.

Concepts.definition: A finding of abnormality following an examination or observation confirming something, such as the presence of a disease, condition, or microorganism.
Evidence for remaining tumor following primary treatment that is only apparent using highly sensitive techniques.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Cannot distinguish between two or more possible values in the current context.
